mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(MAX(FILE_ID), 0), 0) + 1 AS FILE_ID FROM FILE ORDER BY FILE_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE(file_id, file_sub_id, file_nm, file, file_type, use_yn) VALUES (#{fileId}, #{fileSubId}, #{fileNm}, #{file, jdbcType=BLOB, javaType=[B}, #{fileType}, #{useYn})
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(NULLIF(MAX(FILE_SUB_ID), 0), 0) + 1 AS FILE_SUB_ID FROM FILE WHERE FILE_ID = #{fileId} ORDER BY FILE_SUB_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
